data.title: ✈ 10-Day Dubai and South Africa Trip with Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Split your time between glitzy Dubai and one of South Africa’s largest cities—either Cape Town or Johannesburg—on this 10-day vacation

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Tour of China with Air from Rewards Travel China
data.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in metropolises like Beijing and Shanghai and see ancient wonders such as the Great Wall of China on this 10-day tour

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Tour of Japan and China w/Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Gleaming Buddhist temples, Mount Fuji, and Beijing’s Forbidden City await you on this 10-day tour of Japan and China; air is included

data.title: ✈ 11- or 13-Day Tour of Thailand & China w/Air from Affordable World
data.shortDescription: Choose between the action-packed 11-day five-city tour or the more relaxed 13-day three-city tour of Thailand and China; air is included

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Tour of India with Air from Indus Travels
data.shortDescription: See precious gems and ornate marble in the famous Taj Mahal and the pink-sandstone buildings of Jaipur during this 11-day tour of India

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Tour of Poland with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See Warsaw, Kraków, Gdańsk, and more of Poland’s most notable sites on this 11-day tour with airfare

data.title: ✈ 13-Day Tour of Thailand with Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Discover the beauty of Thailand with this nearly two-week trip that takes you from its bustling capital to the mountains to its beaches

data.title: ✈ 14-Day China Tour with River Cruise and Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Explore Shanghai’s Bund district, cruise along the Yangtze river, and see the Great Wall of China on this 14-day tour; air included

data.title: ✈ 14-Day Tour of Thailand with Air from smarTours
data.shortDescription: Escorted tour of Thailand, with included tours, excursions, and plenty of free time for exploration on your own schedule

data.title: ✈ 17-Day Mt. Everest Base Camp Trek w/ Air from Encounters Travel
data.shortDescription: This 17-day trek to Mount Everest base camp takes you past villages and Buddhist monasteries, offering great views of the Himalayas

data.title: ✈ 7- or 9-Day Egypt w/Air and Optional Cruise from Keytours Vacations
data.shortDescription: See at the Great Pyramids of Giza on this 7- or 9-day Egypt tour; depending on the option you choose, you’ll also cruise on the Nile

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Dubai & Maldives w/ Air from Great Value Vacations
data.shortDescription: Explore the high-end shopping and luxury lifestyle of Dubai, then unwind amidst the Maldives’ white-sand beaches and coral reefs

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Tour of Dubai with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See the world’s tallest building and shop for jewelry in Dubai’s markets during this 7-day vacation; air is included

data.title: ✈ 8- or 10-Day Tour of Greece w/ Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Visit a mix of ancient and modern sites, resting up at 4-star hotels in Athens and the Greek islands in between; air is included

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Maldives Vacation with Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Relax in a beachfront villa at a 4-star resort in the Maldives, where you’ll get to enjoy all-inclusive food and drinks

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Tour of Vietnam with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Surround yourself with beauty and history in Vietnam as you travel to Ho Chi Minh City, Halong Bay, and Hanoi; air is included

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Bali and Singapore Vacation with Air from Globotours
data.shortDescription: Get a double dose of island life on this 9-day vacation in Bali and Singapore, which includes 5-star accommodations and half-day city tours

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Tour of Israel with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: 9-day guided tour of Israel includes stops in Tel Aviv, Galilee, Tiberias, and the holy city of Jerusalem; air is included

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Tour of Russia with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See iconic landmarks like Red Square and savor traditional Russian dishes like chicken Kiev on this 9-day tour of Moscow and St. Petersburg

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Turkey Small-Group Tour with Air from Encounters Travel
data.shortDescription: Fully guided, nine-day tour of Turkey, with Istanbul as a central location for the trip
